capture it while its

am i gonna build this whole set if i dont even know if its the right

if i draw it it takes like 2 hrs if i build it and mock it up it might look gorgeous and it might take me a couple days.
either
extend prepro to years or solve things quick. they may see it they may
not see it. if the ycan see it in a sketch you probably just saved

quickly.
you have to do all those things. craig mullins your
